previous.excerpt: Slite, the collaborative workspace for your team's documents, notes, wiki just got a bit better by letting you draw and sketch right into it ✨🧑‍🎨 We did so by integrating with Excalidraw, one of the best open source sketching tool out there.
previous.title: Slite + Excalidraw - Add sketches to all your docs, wiki, notes and projects

localize.description: Slite，你的团队文档、笔记、wiki的协作工作空间刚刚变得更好了，让你可以直接在里面画画和画草图✨🧑🎨我们是通过整合Excalidraw来实现的，Excalidraw是最好的开源草图工具之一。
localize.tagline: 将草图添加到你所有的文档、维基、笔记和项目中。

localize.description: Slite，你的團隊文檔、筆記、wiki的協作工作空間剛剛變得更好了，讓你可以直接在裏面畫畫和畫草圖✨🧑🎨我們是通過整合Excalidraw來實現的，Excalidraw是最好的開源草圖工具之一。
localize.tagline: 將草圖添加到你所有的文檔、維基、筆記和項目中。
